name: resource
description: Information about a resource such as a task, Cloud Storage bucket, database, disk, logical policy, or something similar.

children.name: attribute
children.description: Generic entity metadata attributes of the resource.

children.name: name
children.description: The full name of the resource. For example, Google Cloud: //cloudresourcemanager.googleapis.com/projects/wombat-123, and AWS: arn:aws:iam::123456789012:user/johndoe.

children.name: parent
children.description: The parent of the resource. For a database table, the parent is the database. For a storage object, the bucket name. Deprecated: use resource_ancestors.name.

children.name: product_object_id
children.description: A vendor-specific identifier to uniquely identify the entity (a GUID, OID, or similar)
